hotelDescription.intro: North Star Continental Resort pune la dispozitia dumneavoastra o gama de servicii complete: 164 de camere moderne si confortabile, 3 restaurante cu specific international si romanesc, Centrul de conferinte ultra-modern, Terasa Miami cu piscina de exterior, Lobby Bar, noul salon de infrumusetare si intretinere corporala – Continental Beauty, Night Club Galaxy, Centru de forta si fitness, Rent a Car, si Casino Valoro. Come one come all to our special hotel, where yoou will find the most awesome things to do and the most professional staff.

Come one come all to our special hotel, where yoou will find the most awesome things to do and the most professional staff.
